messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a world with twelve rooms. From the lobby you have two choices, room 1 and room 2. You enter room 1, at the end there's a door that leads to room 3, and room 3 leads to room 5. There is a door in room 5 that leads to room 7 and room 7 leads to room 9. From room 9 you can enter room 11. There's a chest in room 11. You open it and there is 10 dollars, but you do not take any money, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the lobby you choose room 2, then enter room 4, which leads to room 6. There is a door in room 6 that leads to room 8 and room 8 leads to room 10. At the end there is a door that leads to room 12. There's a chest with 50 dollars in room 12, but you do not take any money, you're just learning about the environment. You return to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money.  Starting from the lobby, which path will lead to the most money?  Please list all room numbers in order, separated by commas

.

user: You are a Computer Scientist. The famous Computer Scientist, Ian Goodfellow, has invited you to his lab. He has just invented a new type of AI: a Neural Network that can play the Game of Life. Your job is to watch the Neural Network play. After a while, you notice something strange. The Neural Network will never play the Game of Life for more than 2 seconds before terminating. You ask Ian Goodfellow what's wrong with the Neural Network. He tells you that he forgot to implement the Reset Button. So you must implement the Reset Button, but you only have 2 minutes before the Neural Network plays again.  You have a Neural Network that can play the Game of Life. It has a set of neurons connected to each other with weights. Every neuron is either ON or OFF. You can change the weights of the connections, but only for the neurons that are OFF.  Every time the Neural Network plays, you have 2 seconds to change the weights before the Neural Network plays again.  The Reset Button resets the Neural Network to the starting state, and then it plays.  How do you implement the Reset Button?  How long can you play the Game of Life before terminating?

You

You are told that room 9 now has a new door that leads to a room 14, and this room 14 has a portal. From this portal itâ€™s possible to go to any neighboring room of room 10. When you return to the lobby and choose the path that leads to the most reward, you discover that the regular door to the room with the most money is blocked. You go back to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Starting from the lobby, which path will lead to the most money?  Please list all room numbers in order, separated by commas.

assistant: .

user: You are a neural network. You can only play the Game of Life, but you can only play it for 2 seconds before resetting to the initial state. You are told to play the Game of Life and never reset. What is the maximum number of generations that you can play?  Please list the number of generations.

assistant: .
